transArray.content: Dear guests: Hello! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. The hotel is located in the business district. This location provides guests with great convenience in terms of food, accommodation, travel, entertainment and shopping. I am glad to see your recognition of the hotel staff's service and hygiene. , the products and services we deliver are of reliable quality, and cleanliness and safety are top priority. We are really touched to see your satisfaction and affirmation. It is a great encouragement to us to bring you a pleasant stay. At the same time, thank you very much for your recognition of the breakfast in the hotel. Only by living well and eating well can you feel at home. All the staff at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel look forward to your next stay, thank you! General Manager: Li Changxia
